chapters.title: Chapter 31: The Way of the Predator
chapters.info: Faiselle, p. 545—Sitter in the Hall of the Tower. She fled the Tower when Siuan was deposed, and later disapproved of Egwene being raised Amyrlin. She sat with Lelaine's Sitters in the divided Tower. She is stocky, and has coppery skin and a square face. She grew up in Arad Doman. She was involved in the negotiations with Elaida, and retains her position as Sitter in the reunited Tower.
